backend/main.mo: Main canister logic implementing user profiles, logo storage, story management with categories, comments, permissions, and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old story/comment data to the new schema with view counts, follower count, and renamed comment fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten list of summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables and dark theme rules for the site.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document providing the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, story pages, categories, search, and admin tools within the main layout.
frontend/src/components/AdSlotPlaceholde: Component rendering a styled placeholder for advertisement slots using a dashed card layout.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateLinksPl: Component showing a styled placeholder section for recommended horror book affiliate links.
Renders a comments form and list, fetching and posting comments via hooks tied to a story ID.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Displays a follow button that handles login, follow action, and shows follower count.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Provides the site header with logo, navigation links, search, follow button, and auth-related controls.
Toggle button that switches between night and light mode using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: A search input with clear and submit actions that triggers an external search handler.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the overall site layout with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card with thumbnail, metadata, excerpt, and link to the full story.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authentication state, auto‑refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and adding story comments through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowWebsite.ts: Provides hooks for fetching follower count and performing a follow action, updating queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogo.ts: Defines hooks to fetch, upload, delete, and display the site logo using an actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useNightMode.ts: Implements a night mode toggle with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides hooks for querying, searching, and creating stories, including optional thumbnail uploads, via actor calls and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoryViews.ts: Adds a mutation hook to increment a story’s view count and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useThumbnail.ts: Implements hooks to fetch, upload, delete, and display story thumbnails, invalidating related queries appropriately.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a horror-themed dark UI with custom fonts, colors, and scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Exports story category definitions and helper functions to look up categories and labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogoPage.tsx: Admin UI for uploading, previewing, and deleting the site logo with authentication and validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminStoryNewPage.tsx: Form page for creating new stories with authentication, image upload, YouTube URL validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays stories for a specific category with loading states and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows hero section and latest stories, including loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides search UI for querying stories and displays results with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryPage.tsx: Renders a full story view with thumbnail, metadata, YouTube embed, comments, and view-count incrementing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Utility functions for validating YouTube URLs, extracting video IDs, and generating embed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors via CSS variables, extended typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Project state defining requirements for a Hindi horror storytelling site, listing features, architectural notes, and known deployment issues.
